overview: Robert Morrison brings more than 25 years of experience in the telecommunications and IT industries to TruePosition. Prior to joining TruePosition, Mr. Morrison was head of business operations with Sprint Enterprise Mobility, a mobility-focused consulting and systems integration subsidiary of Sprint. Before joining Sprint, Robert was with British Telecom, where he held key customer-facing roles in sales, business development and business management, within their systems integration business, Syntegra. Robert was a member of the executive team at Syntegra from 1998 to 2005, managing major operations in the UK, Germany and the United States. Robert studied at Queenâ€™s University in Belfast and holds a BA in Social Sciences.

relationships.title: Senior Vice President, Market and Business Development
